attributes.action: deprive the FOUR Head Bankers of there Knighthoods....
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
please consider this to let them fully understand how disgraced
     the people of the UK are and to ensure that they remember for the rest of
     their lives, by loosing what they love best... . their image
     and more potently their dishonoured titles.
